title: Wout van Aert Takes Blame for Visma Tactical Disaster: ‘I Was Selfish’
content:
Van Aert reveals that he didn't want his teammates to attack so they could deliver him to the line: 'I was afraid to be behind a teammate who attacked.'

Read the full article at Wout van Aert Takes Blame for Visma Tactical Disaster: ‘I Was Selfish’ on Velo.
author: ahood
